name: Dr. Aisha Hassan
bio: Senior oncologist with 15 years of experience in cancer diagnosis, staging, and treatment planning. Subspecialty in breast and lung oncology.

name: Dr. Ahmed Khalil
bio: Consultant orthopedic surgeon specializing in knee, hip, and spine cases. Expert in musculoskeletal imaging interpretation.

name: Dr. Leila Abbas
bio: Pediatric specialist with expertise in neonatology and developmental conditions. Trusted for second opinions on complex pediatric cases.

name: Dr. Omar Farouk
bio: Senior radiologist with 18 years of hospital experience in CT, MRI, and ultrasound interpretation. Fellowship-trained in neuroradiology.

name: Dr. Nadia Mansour
bio: Consultant cardiologist specializing in echocardiography, ECG interpretation, and cardiac imaging. Expert in structural heart disease.

name: Dr. Khaled Al-Rashidi
bio: Senior neurologist with subspecialty in neuroimaging and epilepsy. Experienced in complex neurological case reviews and EEG interpretation.

name: Dr. Fatima Al-Sayed
bio: Consultant pathologist with expertise in histopathology and cytology. Specializes in biopsy re-evaluation and diagnostic confirmation.

name: Dr. Youssef Hamdi
bio: Oncology consultant focused on hematological malignancies and lymphoma. Provides structured second opinions on treatment pathways.
